topics.body:
"@Bryon":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5415dc426368724dd2060200#post_5415dc426368724dd2060200
Have you ever seen Under the Red Hood?
That's the one where John DiMaggio voiced Joker. He did one hell of a job and in my opinion was as much of a perfect fit for the character as Mark Hamill.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
In fact everyone in Under the Red Hood was surprisingly good.
Bruce Greenwood gave a good performance as Batman. Neil Patrick Harris was the perfect Nightwing. Although the biggest surprise was Jenson Ackles as Red Hood/[spoiler]Jason Todd[/spoiler]. My sisters used to make me watch Supernatural all the time with them and I never really cared for it. But Ackles performance was fantastic.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
